Package sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.system

This package contains the objects that facilitate the start-up and close-down of the system, and provide the main menu (Simulator Control Panel).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivateCustomerPanelButtonListener
    This control object monitors the ActivateCustomerPanel Button and performs actions in response to the button being pressed.
    ActivateMachineryPanelButtonListener
    This control object monitors the ActivateMachinerySimulatorPanel Button and performs actions in response to the button being pressed.
    ActivateMaintainerPanelButtonListener
    This control object monitors the ActivateMaintainerPanelButton and performs actions in response to the button being pressed.
    BeginSimulationButtonListener
    This control object monitors the Begin Simulation Button and performs actions in response to the button being pressed.
    CashPropertyLoader
    This control object manages the initialization of the CashStore.
    DrinkPropertyLoader
    This control object manages the initialization of the DrinksStore
    EndSimulationButtonListener
    This control object monitors the End Simulation Button and performs actions in response to the Button being pressed.
    Environment
    This entity object holds the environment settings used to configure the system.
    FilePropertyLoader
    This control object implements the interface, PropertyLoader, to provide the generic functionality required to initialize the stores.
    MainController
    This object is the main controller of the vending machine. It coordinates the main operations of the VMCS.
    SimulationController
    This control object represents the operating system user interface at which the VMCS application can be launched.
    SimulatorControlPanel
    This panel is displayed when the system is started up. It enables the user (the Controller) to:
    1- Start (switch on);
    2- Stop (switch off);
    3- Activate the Customer Panel;
    4- Activate the Maintenance Panel;
    5- Activate the Machinery Simulator Panel;

Package sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.system Description

This package contains the objects that facilitate the start-up and close-down of the system, and provide the main menu (Simulator Control Panel).
